abstract: Facebook users have been targeted by spam and a rapidly mutating Internet worm, but the company says it is fighting off the attacks.
snippet: Facebook users have been targeted by spam and a rapidly mutating Internet worm, but the company says it is fighting off the attacks.
lead_paragraph: On the Internet, popularity often draws the attention of hackers. So it is not surprising that Facebook has become the target of a spate of attacks, just as the membership on the site has swelled to about 100 million active users worldwide.
